extractions: {"position": null, "sentence": "On average, these is a statistically significant negative relationship with pos (\u03c72 (1, N = 2215) = 14.9, p = 1", "statisticType": "cstest", "record": {"X2val": "14.9", "N": "2215", "pval": "1", "V": null}, "aspect": null, "condition": null}

{"position": null, "sentence": "Bartlett\u2019s test was also statistically significant [x2(666) = 4913.29, p<.001", "statisticType": "cstest", "record": {"X2val": null, "N": null, "pval": null, "V": null}, "aspect": null, "condition": null}

{"position": null, "sentence": "Intuitive decision-making style and presentation style: An increase in intuitive decision-making score was associated with an increase in the odds of participants under bar chart condition reporting higher values of explanation satisfaction, with an odds ratio of 2.40 (95% CI, 1.14 to 5.18), Wald \u03c72(2) = 5.67, p = .023", "statisticType": "cstest", "record": {"X2val": null, "N": null, "pval": null, "V": null}, "aspect": null, "condition": null}

{"position": null, "sentence": "Using Friedman test we find the relationship between scenario and upper arm count was significant (\u03c72 (5, N = 666) = 98.06, p = 1", "statisticType": "cstest", "record": {"X2val": "98.06", "N": "666", "pval": "1", "V": null}, "aspect": null, "condition": null}

{"position": null, "sentence": "A similar test was performed for valance, and scenario was a significant factor (\u03c72 (1, N = 180) = 64.16, p = 1", "statisticType": "cstest", "record": {"X2val": "64.16", "N": "180", "pval": "1", "V": null}, "aspect": null, "condition": null}

{"position": null, "sentence": "For all eight mechanisms Mauchly\u2019s sphericity assumption was met: Gun Recoil (\u03c7 2 (2) = 0.955, p > 0.01); Invisibility (\u03c7 2 (2) = 0.870, p > 0.01); Underwater; Possess (\u03c72(2) = 0.883, p > 0.01", "statisticType": "cstest", "record": {"X2val": null, "N": null, "pval": null, "V": null}, "aspect": null, "condition": null}

{"position": null, "sentence": "We conducted a Chi-square analysis of independence and found that the proportion of each category differs depending on the painting (\u03c72(63) = 263.82, p < .001", "statisticType": "cstest", "record": {"X2val": null, "N": null, "pval": null, "V": null}, "aspect": null, "condition": null}

{"position": null, "sentence": "Additionally, we observed a possible interaction (p<= 0.05, although nonsignificant after Bonferroni correction, corrected p< 0.01) between: Rational decision-making style and interactivity: An increase in rational decisionmaking score was associated with an increase in the odds of participants under interactive high condition reporting higher values of explanation sufficiency, with an odds ratio of 3.20 (95% CI, 0.99 to 10.65), Wald \u03c72(1) = 3.81, p = .051", "statisticType": "cstest", "record": {"X2val": null, "N": null, "pval": null, "V": null}, "aspect": null, "condition": null}

{"position": null, "sentence": "Visualization familiarity and interactivity: An increase in visualization familiarity score was associated with an increase in the odds of participants under interactive high condition reporting higher values of explanation satisfaction, odds ratio of 1.91 (95% CI, 1.03 to 3.58), Wald \u03c72(1) = 4.24, p = .039", "statisticType": "cstest", "record": {"X2val": null, "N": null, "pval": null, "V": null}, "aspect": null, "condition": null}

{"position": null, "sentence": "Again, we conducted a Chisquare analysis of independence and found that the proportion of each category differs depending on the painting (\u03c72(28) = 110.13, p < .001", "statisticType": "cstest", "record": {"X2val": null, "N": null, "pval": null, "V": null}, "aspect": null, "condition": null}

{"position": null, "sentence": "Social awareness and interactivity: An increase in social awareness score was associated with an increase in the odds of participants under interactive high condition reporting higher values of explanation persuasiveness, with an odds ratio of 3.83 (95% CI, 1.20 to 12.34), Wald \u03c72(1) = 5.17, p = .023", "statisticType": "cstest", "record": {"X2val": null, "N": null, "pval": null, "V": null}, "aspect": null, "condition": null}

{"position": null, "sentence": "In all these cases, a positive trend was observed between these variables and social awareness, i.e. the higher the social awareness score, the higher the perceived explanation quality, the transparency, the effectiveness and the trust, independent of the style or interactivity (see Figure 4c).  Fig. 4. a) Kernel density estimate of user characteristics scores: rational and intuitive decision making styles, social awareness and visualization familiarity. b) Effect of rational decision-making style on the perception of the overall system (fitted means of individual scores). c) Effect of social awareness on the perception of the overall system (fitted means of individual scores).  1  2  3  4  0.60 \u2014 0.40 0.53 \u2014 0.64 0.47 0.45 \u2014 0.40 0.44 0.50 0.45  \f 14  5.3  Hernandez-Bocanegra and Ziegler  Perception of Explanations  Interactivity: We found a main significant effect of interactivity; here, the odds of participants reporting higher values of explanation sufficiency when interactivity high was 2.30 (95% CI, 1.26 to 4.29) times that of interactivity low, a statistically significant effect, Wald \u03c72(1) = 7.32, p = .007", "statisticType": "cstest", "record": {"X2val": null, "N": null, "pval": null, "V": null}, "aspect": null, "condition": null}

{"position": null, "sentence": "We found that touch duration was significantly long for those who identified as romantic partners using the Kruskal-Wallis test (\u03c72 (1, N = 222) = 37.23, p = 1", "statisticType": "cstest", "record": {"X2val": "37.23", "N": "222", "pval": "1", "V": null}, "aspect": null, "condition": null}
